::: {.question} **Cumulative Abnormal Return (CAR) Around News** A firm-specific news generates an **event-day abnormal return = 1.11%**, followed by **6 days** with an **average abnormal return of 0.14% per day**. ::: {.question-block}
✅ CAR logic (in %): Sum abnormal returns over the window.
CAR = AR0 + ∑t>0 ARt = 1.11% + 6 × 0.14% = 1.95%.

Interpretation: Under semi-strong EMH, prices should adjust quickly to news. A post-event drift (positive or negative) may indicate delayed reaction or under/overreaction.
::: :::
